The Attic PDF Converter API lets users extract text data from PDF documents. It can be used to create HTML documents that have high fidelity with the look of a PDF document. Alternatively it can be...
Pan Macmillan Book Extracts API lets developers call for an extract for books from Pan Macmillan. Available fields for extraction are author, title, ISBN, reading time and publication date.
